Reviews.Content: stayed recently kensington park apartments stayed travel london home berlin noticed lots improvements accomodation cleanliness am happy customer nice warm staff location meet poeple londoni summer recommend regards james anthony

Reviews.Content: stayed sep owner holiday gentleman entertained shown termites windows drawers filled garbage uncleaned bins smelly toilets cobwebs rodents trap refusing stay basement slightly uncleaned bins stained bedsheets corridor enter check earlier pay money cash card details left days issues charged placed card card company pls avoid worth location else property nightmare

Reviews.Content: arrived ensure day activities hotel management lazy struggled simplest paperwork hour checkin inside immediately smell mould dampness questionable overall cleanliness meant stay day heck ago wont anyway boy regret decision arriving late night hear dripping noise ceiling water dripping bed entire ceiling wet 4am evacuate nearby hotel worse bit unapologetic hotel manager plumber care offered decided worth effort despite looking hotel 4 morning actually managed reasonably priced infinitely accommodating alternative days discovered despite promising charge citing stayed anyway note water pouring bed wish worse enemy experience hence warning
